mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id,s.name,c.cname,s.product_spec,p.price,p.quantity FROM purchaseorder_detail p LEFT JOIN product s ON p.product_id = s.product_id LEFT JOIN classify c ON p.cid = c.cid WHERE purchaseOrder_id = #{0} limit #{1},#{2}
select count(1) from purchaseorder_detail where 1=1 and purchaseOrder_id = #{0}
